notesStmt.note: At one point, this manuscript likely formed part of Whitman's cultural geography scrapbook.

bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Found a new American Religion (? No Religion)
bibl.orgName: Trent Collection of Whitmaniana, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University
bibl.note: Transcribed from digital images of the original item.

body.ab: Founding a new American Religion (? No Religion)
body.p: That which is comprehensive enough to include all the Doctrines & Sects—and give them all places and chances, each after its kind.—
